Creating a new Connection Profile

A Connection Profile is used by Fabric Composer to connect to a running fabric. More information about Connection Profiles can be found here

Procedure

  1. Navigate to the Connection Profile store: cd $HOME/.composer-connection-profiles
  2. Create a new profile folder mkdir ./MyProfile then navigate into the new profile folder cd MyProfile

  3. Using your favourite text editor, create a new file called connection.json that contains the following information:

    { "type": <hlf|web>, "keyValStore":"/home/<your-username>/.composer-credentials", "membershipServicesURL": <your-membership-services-url>, "peerURL": <your-peer-url>, "eventHubURL": <your-event-hub-url> }
